title: MrCryptHodl
author: MrCryptHodl
created_time: April 26, 2023, 09:00:21 PMLast edit: March 19, 2024, 11:33:50 PM by MrCryptHodl
content: 1HoDLCLUB x Silk Road 2.1mBTC Square ingotWelcome everyone to the Official 1HoDLCLUB x Silk Road 2.1mBTC Fine Silver 999.9 Square ingot sale!This is the second official collection of the year 2023 of the 1HoDLCLUB! This is a Fine Silver 999.9 Square ingot themed Silk Road, on the front we find the famous Silk Road Anonymous market logo! on the back we find the famous "Bitcoiin Thug" Hologram, on the upper part of the ingot you have the number of your ingot and on the lower part we find the first Bit of the public key of this one. The ingot is in Fine Silver 999.9 material, with a Gold plating for the Two-tone!The ingot is delivered with a COA, essential to verify the authenticity of this unique piece, on the COA we find all the information on the ingot, as well as the serial number and the public address in full in the form of the QR code. , this allows the buyer to verify his public address without having to go through the Forum. The certificate comes with a uniquely designed and dated booklet for that piece. The left page of the booklet will have a picture of the bars the same size as the certificate!All the coins have the denomination 2.1 mBTC and are sold loaded [Of course they will be loaded once they reach the hands of their new owners and loading gonna be made by batch]there are exactly 111 coins that will be in circulation, from 1 to 100 these are the Fine Silver 999.9 bars and then finally from 101 to 111 they will be the Fine Gold 999.9 versions. Fine Gold 999.9 Version pre sale spot, how it work ?Due to the very low number of Fine Gold 999.9 version, only owners of the Fine Silver 999.9 version will have access to it. For this you must announce during this sale if you wish to participate in the pre sale directly on the thread.The concept is simple, the Fine Gold 999.9 version is limited to 1 piece per person, there are 11 places for the pre sale. If we exceed the 11 interested a raffle will be made to allocate the pre sale spot.In the event that we do not reach the 11 interested parties or there will be withdrawals thereafter, it will be possible to have more than one piece per person, however a raffle will be made to allocate a second slot between the interested parties. a second room.Regarding the fine gold 999.9 ingot itself, it will be composed of 1/2 Troy ounce (15.55g) of Fine Gold 999.9 And a size of 30x30mm. It will be delivered in the new 1HoDLCLUB slabs in Stainless steel (kialara type slab), the different information such as weight, sizes, material, public address, serial number, all will be laser engraved on the new slab! Size of the slabs is 7.6 cm x 6 cm and 1 cm Thickness, it's composed of 3 stainless steal part and 2 sapphire window. And like the Fine Silver 999.9 version it will be accompanied by its booklet with a different COA inside.Its final price is $2100, which includes everything mentioned above as well as delivery costs.Having different elements to produce such as coins, holograms and stainless steal slabs, it takes approximately 45 days from payment to delivery.Interest list : Bullion-n-BTC / KellermanSlayedU / av8rjeff / tldr-hodl / CoinXcoiN3k / .... Important informationThere is no limit on the purchase of coins per member for the Fine Silver 999.9 version. Serial Numbers cannot be choose, first arrived, first served. When 50% of Fine Silver 999.9 will be sold, you can request buyer funded version between number 51 to 100.(The BUYER FUNDED versions will have a "BUYER FUNDED" mention on the top and bottom of the QR Code behind the Hologram on the COA.)The first orders batch will be sent on Tuesday, May 2, 2023!1HoDLCLUB x Silk Road 2.1mBTC Fine Silver 999.9 Square ingotMintage : 100 -  70 SOLD / 30 AVAILABLEMaterial : Fine Silver 999.9Size : 30x30mmThickness : 2.8mmWeight : 20gDenomination : 2.1 mBTC (0.0021 BTC)Serial : 1 to 100The price is 150$ per ingot + 0.0021 BTC loading per ingot + shipping costShipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide:1 - 2 ingot : 18$3 - 4 ingot : 26$5 - 8 ingot : 37 $Europe:1 - 2 ingot - 15 $3 - 4 ingot : 21$5 - 8 ingot : 28 $Payment Adress :BTC : bc1q3hatzugaa2ygcka89knsaxefg8gxcpa784t6juAfter payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Coins / Loading / ShippingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]Reference list :Code:BTC  : https://twitter.com/MrCryptHODL1HoDLCLUB Store : https://1hodlclub.store [NEW]
